New Records: Arshdeep Singh became India's fifth-most prolific T20I wicket-taker with 86 scalps.
Key Match Events: Arshdeep Singh took 3 wickets for 14 runs.
Varun Chakravarthy took 3 wickets for 31 runs.
India won by 7 wickets with 49 balls remaining.
India achieved their best powerplay score against Bangladesh in T20Is with 71 runs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at a debuting stadium in Gwalior.
The pitch had slightly uneven bounce which affected Bangladesh's batting.
